title: Need help finding this font
content:
Hi, I'm looking for the name of this font. Please let me know if anybody knows what font this is, I appreciate all your help.

Thanks much,

Chris

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font-type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817031422/http:/typophile.com/files/font-type.jpg) | 129.55 KB |
author: Relevant Logo

comments.content:
It must be **[Wolf's Bane](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817031422/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Wolf%27s%20Bane%20-%20Regular&fid=57757e7bdcc260551e28ab30e27c3384&fsize=72&text=LOOK%20GOOD%20FEEL%20GOOD&wrap=2)** by Daniel Zadorozny (2001, Iconian Fonts, Free for personal use) maybe a bit expanded

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817031422/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
Great, thanks so much! I appreciate your help
